caption.p: Photochemical performance, measured as maximum quantum yield ( F v/ F m) of photosystem II (PSII), and total biomass of C. quitensis growing in three different soil types (NS: non-sterilized native soil, S-NS: sterilized native soil, and RI-SNS: re-inoculated native soil) under current (A and C), and future climatic conditions (B and D; 20% increased water addition). Bars are means (± SD). Bars labeled with different letters indicate significant differences (Tukey HSD tests, α = 0.05).
